title: 7.30 Report: The Dismissal
brief_description:
On the eve of the thirtieth anniversary of the dismissal of the Whitlam government, a special edition of the ABC’s national nightly current affairs program, ‘7:30 Report’ takes an in-depth look at the events of 1975.

The program features interviews with both Gough Whitlam and Malcolm Fraser who comment on the events of 1975, discuss the possibility of 4 year fixed terms for both the House of Representatives and the Senate and reflect upon the politics of modern Australia, and upon each other.

Broadcast on 10th November, 2005.
